entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 12:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SW 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
